stimulusHtml: Which visual elements in Jaune Quick-to-See Smithâ€™s Trade (Gifts for Trading Land with White People) contribute most to emotional expressiveness of the painting?
choicesHtml: the gestural painting style and visible drips of red pigment
the central placement and illusionistic rendering of the canoe
the strong vertical emphasis and the three-panel triptych format
the mass-produced imagery and inclusion of found objects
